name: Backflip mountain music game
description:
Highly addictive game!

Discover an exciting adventure through the endless mountains. Slide down, gain speed, jump, and back flip! Achieve perfect landings to multiply your score but be careful, the higher the jump, the harder the landing.

Complete all the achievements and unlock the funniest characters to ride with: Snowmobile, Cupcake, Monkey, Yeti...and more!

Enjoy easy gameplay - simply press and hold to gain speed and back flip - and thrilling ambient music to play with.
